overview: Gimme a C-R-E-A-M-P-I-E! Raise more than your school spirit with the hottest cheerleaders in XXX! They're flaunting their pom-poms and flipping up those tiny skirts to show you the new meaning of "Drill Team!" Just make sure you give them the reward they've been cheering for a sweet, hot load to take in & squeeze out in every sticky scene!
title: Creampied Cheerleaders 6
